title: 340: How to Build Amazing Shoulders
description: Whether you are a man or woman, well developed and defined shoulders will take your look and confidence to the next level. In this episode Sal, Adam and Justin discuss how to build and improve the function of your shoulders. Get MAPS Anabolic, MAPS Performance, MAPS Aesthetic and the Butt Builder Blueprint (The RGB Super Bundle) packaged together at a substantial DISCOUNT at www.mindpumpmedia.com. Get your Kimera Koffee, Mind Pump's first official sponsor, at www.kimerakoffee.com, code "mindpump" for 10% off! Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Each week our favorite reviewers are announced on the show and sent Mind Pump T-shirts!
